name: Alien Mixtape Blues
description:
left arrow: move left

right arrow: move right

up arrow: move up (on some mini-games)

down arrow: move down (on some mini-games)

space: to start

enter: to un/pause

music by King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard

album: Flying Microtonal Banana
